#### **Bio** 

I'm Ernesto, a Genomic Sciences undergraduate at ENES Juriquilla, UNAM. My interests include microbiology, human genetics, and biomedicine, with a strong focus on wet-lab research. I enjoy working at the intersection of experimental biology and quantitative analysis to better understand biological systems and develop useful research tools.
